clubs.description: MDG SPACE has a bunch of enthusiastic students who aim to explore, ideate and develop products over a vast range of software technologies in the IIT Roorkee campus and beyond. They also actively foster the open source culture.

Software Development Section Laboratories is a student-run technical group at IIT Roorkee, which aims to encourage the development of technology and innovation in the campus and beyond. They believe in learning and sharing knowledge; collaboration and experimentation; and human interaction that matters the most.
